text: WrestleMania X8 was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It was held on March 17, 2002 at the SkyDome in Toronto, Ontario. It was the eighteenth WrestleMania event held by the WWF and was the second WrestleMania to take place in Toronto with the first being WrestleMania VI in 1990. This was the final WrestleMania under WWF name. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times Sunday Night Heat Rikishi, Scotty 2 Hotty, and Albert defeated Mr. Perfect, Lance Storm and Test Six-man tag team match with Jacqueline as special guest referee 3:06 1 Rob Van Dam defeated William Regal (c) Singles match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 6:19 2 Diamond Dallas Page (c) defeated Christian Singles match for the WWF European Championship 6:08 3 Maven (c) fought Goldust to a no contest Hardcore match for the WWF Hardcore Championship 3:15 4 Kurt Angle defeated Kane Singles match 10:45 5 The Undertaker defeated Ric Flair No Holds Barred match 18:47 6 Edge defeated Booker T Singles match 6:32 7 Stone Cold Steve Austin defeated Scott Hall (with Kevin Nash) Singles match 9:51 8 Billy and Chuck (c) defeated The APA (Faarooq and Bradshaw), The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von) (with Stacy Keibler) and The Hardy Boyz (Matt and Jeff Hardy) Four Corners Survivor Series Elimination match for the WWF Tag Team Championship 13:50 9 The Rock defeated Hollywood Hulk Hogan Singles match 16:23 10 Jazz (c) defeated Trish Stratus and Lita Triple Threat match for the WWF Women's Championship 6:16 11 Triple H defeated Chris Jericho (c) (with Stephanie McMahon) Singles match for the Undisputed WWF Championship 18:41 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official WrestleMania X8 website Category:2002 in professional wrestling Category:Sport in Toronto Category:WrestleMania Category:2002 in Canada Category:21st century in Toronto
title: WrestleMania X8
